column4: anyone in here know how to write a nautilus script? I just want to be able to select a file and I want it to ask me where to save the new file it's going to create. The command is: mplayer -dumpaudio inputfilename.flv -dumpfile outputfilename.mp
it shouldn't matter (unless you had the beta/alpha), they will still be in your profile.
ya it's worked for ages, recently it just sit's 'connecting'..sorry for the delay I was moving to the patio :)
um, no samba issues just pidgin :)
